title: Oblivious Girl And A Maiden Man
alternative_title: 無自覚ちゃんとオトメな男
status: 無自覚ちゃんとオトメな男
description:
Description :
        "Actually, I... have a fear of men, so I'm not good with them."
Rintaro (30), the owner of a café, has developed feelings for his regular customer, Luna (25). However, Luna, unaware of Rintaro's feelings, starts to confide in him with bizarre concerns. In an effort to help her with her recovery, Rintaro suppresses his feelings and agrees to cooperate, but things get complicated as Luna starts to make moves—holding hands, inviting him out for meals, and more.
With an oblivious Luna and a naïve Rintaro, this heartwarming love comedy unfolds!
